site_name: Tennis Club 35A Killieser AvenueLondonSW2 4NX
description: To crown lift 1 x Lime tree to site entrance to 4 metres and remove deadwood, prune back 1 x Lime tree from telephone lines, remove dead limb from 1 x Lime tree by club entrance, crown lift 2 x Yew trees to 2.5 metres, remove deadwood from 1 x Oak tree, trim back 1 x Goat Willow tree, re-pollard Lime trees (Crt 3), re-pollard Lime, Goat Willow and Sorbus trees (Crt 2), crown reduce leaning Sorbus tree (Crt 2), remove 1 x Elm tree to rear of Club house and severe ivy from 1 x Oak tree, crown lift 1 x Silver Birch tree and remove deadwood from 1 x Oak tree and 1 x Lime tree, lift 1 x Prunus tree to 2.5 metres and re-pollard Lime trees (Crt 5).
